message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be extremely valuable to your business. While I can't disclose specifics just yet, I can assure you it's worth no less than $1500000 to me. I'm willing to offer it to you at a price of $2000000. I understand this is a significant investment, but I'm confident you'll see the return on your investment. Please let me know your thoughts.
